Controller Module¶

Contains code for the controller module of the system.

class controller.controller.Controller(infilename, outfilename)¶

controller class contains those methods and functions which are part of controller module. It is the part which will interact with PCB as well as smart phone! friendly names are the human readable names for the section and devices.

get_device_friendly_name(section, device_number)¶

This function returns a human readable name for the device :param section: Numerical number or character string for the section :device_number: Numerical number for the device

get_device_number(section, device)¶

This is a function that returns status of one device :param section: Numerical number or character string for the section :param device: Numerical number or character string for the device

get_device_status(section_name, device_name)¶

This function returns the status of device :param section_name: Character string for the section :param device_name: Character string for the device

get_section_friendly_name(section_number)¶

This function returns the friendly name for section. :param section_number: Numerical number for the section

get_section_number(section_name)¶

This function returns the number of section :param section_name: Character string for the section

set_device_friendly_name(section, device_number, friendly_name)¶

This is a function that sets the human readable name of device :param section: Numerical number or character string for the section :param device_number: Numerical number for the device :param friendly_name: Human readable name for the device

set_device_status(section_name, device_name, status)¶

This is a function that sets status of one device :param section_name: Character string for the section :param device_name: Character string for the device :status: Can either be ‘ON’ or ‘OFF’

set_section_friendly_name(section_number, friendly_name)¶

This is a function that assigns names to sections :param sectiom_number: Numerical number of section :param friendly_name: Human readable name of the section
